doctor.name: Sarada Kumar Saha (Arun)
doctor.info: Sarada Kumar Saha (Arun) has been working as Consultant Occupational Therapist at Autism Child’s Care (AC care). He has been working as Senior Occupational Therapist for a decade in different renowned organisation in Bangladesh including CRP, Faith Bangladesh. He worked at Centre for the Rehabilitation of the paralysed (CRP) as Seniors Occupational Therapist more than 10 years while he provides service to neurological and pediatric patient’s such as Autism, Cerebral palsy. He is one of the best OPT (Oral Placement Therapist) certified, USA. OPT helps to improve Speech clarity, Oral Sensory issues and Feeding. As one of top most senior OT, he gathered knowledge and skills to provide Sensory Integration Therapy, Tasked based approach and psychosocial counselling.
